class_notes: The delivery format listed for this class is based on current university guidelines.  However, if there are further changes to the COVID19 guidelines for Fall 2021 or other acts beyond our control, the school reserves the right the modify the delivery method for this class.
course_description: First of two professional development courses focusing on 'soft' skills necessary for a successful career in professional accounting career. This course develops students' written communication and Excel skills, and reviews the ethics and core values of the CPA profession by examining the key requirements of the AICPA Code of Professional Conduct. This is a self-study course required for BBA/MPA dual-degree students.
prerequisites: MPA Students OnlyThis section is reserved for students in the Professional Accounting program.
